name: neo4jd3-graph
description: The neo4jd3-graph npm package is a tool designed for visualizing Neo4j graph data. This package utilizes the power of D3.js (version 4.2.1) for rendering interactive and dynamic graphs representing relationships within Neo4j databases. The visualization is enhanced with Font Awesome icons (version 4.7.0) to provide a rich and aesthetically pleasing representation.
author: Reddy Bala Subrahmanyam
